    • beforeCall

      public Object[] beforeCall(Object target, Method method, Object[] args) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: Interceptor
      This method will be invoked before JDBC call.

      You can modify method arguments by returning new arguments.

      Specified by:
      beforeCall in interface Interceptor
      Parameters:
      target - object on which call is performed
      method - method
      args - method arguments
      Returns:
      new arguments for the call or null
      Throws:
      Exception

    • newConnection

      public void newConnection(Connection c, long threadNum, String threadName) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: Interceptor
      This method will be invoked after obtaining new JDBC connection through MiddleManJDBCDriver.

      Here you can potentially modify connection properties like auto commit, transaction isolation level, network timeout, etc.

      Specified by:
      newConnection in interface Interceptor
      Parameters:
      c - JDBC connection
      threadNum - thread Id
      threadName - thread name
      Throws:
      Exception
